Name: Grid Miner
About the game: Grid Miner is a real-time strategy puzzle game where you mine asteroids to gather resources and expand your space station. Unlock new tools and utilities as you progress through levels. Maintain your quotas and learn more about your employer and coworkers at Hypergo Industries. Features 18 unique buildings like power plants, asteroid crushers, tractor beams and more! 15 levels to test your skills Rich backstory about Hypergo Industries and its employees Unlock rewards and new buildings as you progress through levels Relaxing original soundtrack 4 different color pallets
Meta Title: Grid Miner: May 3, 2022, Kairoscope and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Grid Miner? Check out the release date (May 3, 2022), developer insights from Kairoscope, and a complete game summary.
